titles.title: I stand amazed in the presence

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How marvelous! How wonderful! And my song shall ever be: How marvelous! How wonderful! Is my Savior’s love for me!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I stand amazed in the presence Of Jesus the Nazarene, And wonder how He could love me, A sinner condemned, unclean.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For me it was in the garden, He prayed: “Not my will, but Thine.” He had no tears for His own griefs, But sweat-drops of blood for mine.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In pity angels beheld Him, And came from the world of light To strengthen Him in the sorrows He bore for my soul that night.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When with the ransomed in glory His face I at last shall see, ’Twill be my joy through the ages To sing of His love for me.{/lang-eng}
